INITIATIVEHELPER.resourcename.name: Resource to change
INITIATIVEHELPER.resourcename.hint: Most systems use attributes.hp, but if the system you use doesn't, or if you'd rather use a different property, you can set it here.
INITIATIVEHELPER.add-defeated.name: Set defeated status on zero HP
INITIATIVEHELPER.add-defeated.hint: When pressing the button(skull) to drop the HP to zero, also set the defeated status
INITIATIVEHELPER.show-dialog.name: Show the Window
INITIATIVEHELPER.show-dialog.hint: Just in case you'd rather not see the dialog, if you're on a small display
INITIATIVEHELPER.gm-only.name: GM Only
INITIATIVEHELPER.gm-only.hint: Only show the dialog for the Gamesmaster
INITIATIVEHELPER.double-click.name: Allow Double-Click
INITIATIVEHELPER.double-click.hint: Double-clicking the down or up arrows will fully heal or completely drain.  Add this if you can't right click the skull or heart.
INITIATIVEHELPER.clear-savingthrows.name: Clear Death Saving Throws
INITIATIVEHELPER.clear-savingthrows.hint: Clear death saving throws automatically when healed
INITIATIVEHELPER.clear-after-enter.name: Clear After Applying
INITIATIVEHELPER.clear-after-enter.hint: Clear the text box after apply damage, uncheck this if you still want to keep the last value entered
INITIATIVEHELPER.show-option.name: Window Show Options
INITIATIVEHELPER.show-option.hint: Change how the Always HP window is shown
INITIATIVEHELPER.load-option.name: Load Option
